title: Harvestman

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player, then choose three targets. That night, the chosen player may only visit one out of the three targets. They gain roleblock and control immunity for this night. They can visit without doing an action that night.
- At night, choose to Reap. Guess one of the three targets you gave your player, or guess that they visited no one. If you correctly guess which target the chosen player visited, you visit the chosen player at night and reap their soul, killing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You may not effect Peasants, and may not select them as targets.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4323
*The bodyguard shivered as he stood outside the door of his client. He was meant to be the shepherd; as of now he was the sheep. A relentless noise frayed his nerves - he heard the slow pace of heavy footsteps, and a metallic rasp of a blade being dragged on the cobblestone road. The noise suddenly stopped as the clouds cleared. The moonlight revealed a cloaked man wielding a scythe, standing silently. The harvestman guessed correctly.*
